SEARCH
Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.controller

Class TeacherQuestionBankManagementController.QuestionRecord

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.BaseManagementController.BaseRecord
comp3111.examsystem.controller.TeacherQuestionBankManagementController.QuestionRecord
Enclosing class:
TeacherQuestionBankManagementController
public static class TeacherQuestionBankManagementController.QuestionRecord extends BaseManagementController.BaseRecord
Represents a question record in the management system. This class contains details about a question, including the question text, its type, possible answer options, correct answer, and score value.
